Detailed Description

Represent one mc2-node in the tree that are displayed in the StreetSegmentItemInfoDialog.

Contains information about the node and will, if clicked, highlight the node on the map.

Create a new tree-node that represent one mc2-node.

Parameters:
name The name of the street where the node is located.
node The node to display.
myDialog The dialog where the tree-node will be displayed. To be able to e.g. call getMapArea().
